1be29b14-b97a-4093-9a34-f67240b41834: I remember that summer hike with everyone, sitting on that log after reaching the summit. The view was breathtaking, but what made it special was all of us being together. Grandpa was quietly admiring the mountains, and Mom and Dad were talking about how far we'd come. It was one of those moments where nothing else mattered—just the family, the fresh air, and the feeling that we were all connected by something deeper than words.
